services.name: Bang Trim
services.description: A bang trim is a quick haircut that reshapes and maintains the length and style of fringe or bangs, framing the face.

services.name: Formal Updo
services.description: An updo is when the hair is pulled up and styled, perfect for dressing up or special events.

services.name: Blowout
services.description: Hair is washed and styled with blow-dryer leaves the hair smooth and bouncy

services.name: Hot Tool Styling
services.description: Hair is styled using a flat iron or curling iron.

services.name: Perm
services.description: A perm is a way to add curls or waves to your hair.

services.name: Scalp And Neck Massage
services.description: 20-min head and scalp massage with hair mask

services.name: Redken Acidic Bonding Treatment
services.description: A customized treatment that balances hair pH

services.name: Keratin Treatment
services.description: A Smoothing and Strengthening protein treatment.

services.name: Color Consultation
services.description: A color consultation is a chat to plan the perfect hair color for your look and vibe.

services.name: Color Correction Consultation
services.description: A color correction consultation is a quick chat to figure out how to fix or adjust your hair color to get it looking right again.

services.name: Color Retouch
services.description: Color new growth between 1/4 inch up to 1 1/2 inches

services.name: All Over Color
services.description: Color hair roots to end.

services.name: Blonding Retouch
services.description: Coloring up 1 1/2 inch new growth with a lightener, includes toner.

services.name: All Over Blonding
services.description: Coloring from roots to end with lightener, includes toner.

services.name: Accent Highlight
services.description: A touch of highlights that frame the face and around the part (up to 10 foils), includes toner

services.name: Partial Highlight
services.description: Highlights around the face and crown (up to 20 foils) includes toner

services.name: Full Highlight
services.description: All-Over Highlight

services.name: Partial Balayage

services.name: Full Balayage
services.description: Freehand highlights throughout

services.name: Gloss Or Toner
services.description: Add shine (clear) or refresh toner

services.name: Vivid Fashion Color Add-on
services.description: Add-on to a highlight or bonding service

services.name: Vivid Fashion Color Refresh
services.description: Refresh a vivid color

services.name: Hair Extension Consultation
services.description: A hair extension consultation is a quick chat to find the best extensions for your style and length.

services.name: Tribal Braids
services.description: This style typically features cornrows braided along the scalp in creative designs, combined with knotless or feed-in braids that extend past the scalp. Tribal braids are versatile, long-lasting, and serve as a protective style that promotes hair growth while showcasing cultural heritage and personal style.

services.name: Silk Press
services.description: A silk press is a heat-styling method that straightens natural hair without chemicals, giving it a smooth, shiny, and flowy finish. The process starts with a deep cleanse and conditioning to remove buildup and add moisture. After detangling, a heat protectant is applied, and the hair is blow-dried straight. Then, small sections are flat-ironed using a titanium or ceramic iron to achieve a sleek, polished look. A light serum or oil is added for shine and frizz control. The result is soft, silky hair that moves naturally—mimicking relaxed hair, but without chemical processing.

services.name: Hair Relaxer
services.description: A hair relaxer is a chemical treatment used to permanently straighten tightly coiled or curly hair. The process begins with sectioning the hair and applying a protective base to the scalp. A relaxer cream is then applied to the new growth or entire hair shaft, depending on the need. The product breaks down the hair's natural curl pattern, allowing it to be straightened. After a set processing time, the relaxer is rinsed out thoroughly, followed by a neutralizing shampoo to stop the chemical process and restore the hair's pH balance. The hair is then deep conditioned, dried, and styled. The result is smooth, straight hair that requires touch-ups every 6–8 weeks as new growth appears.

services.name: Knotless Braids
services.description: Instead of using a tight knot to anchor the braid, the stylist starts braiding with your natural hair and slowly feeds in small pieces of braiding hair as they move down the strand. This creates a smooth transition from natural hair to added hair, resulting in lightweight, flexible braids that are less likely to cause breakage or scalp tension.

services.name: Stitch Braids
services.description: Stitch braids are a sleek and stylish form of feed-in cornrows that feature clean, defined "stitch-like" lines between each braid. The process starts with washing, conditioning, and blow-drying the hair to ensure it's clean and smooth for braiding. Next, the hair is sectioned into clean, straight parts using a rat-tail comb and shine-enhancing gel or edge control. The key to stitch braids is creating sharp horizontal lines (or stitches) across each part. This is done by using your fingers or a comb to separate small sections of hair evenly while braiding. Braiding hair extensions are gradually fed in as the stylist braids close to the scalp, helping to create a fuller, longer braid while keeping the stitch pattern neat and uniform. Stitch braids are known for their crisp, eye-catching look and can be styled in various patterns, sizes, and lengths.

services.name: Two Strand Twist
services.description: The hair is sectioned into small parts, depending on how thick or thin you want the twists. Each section is split into two equal strands and twisted around each other tightly, working down to the ends. The ends are usually coiled around a finger or sealed with a bit of product to prevent unraveling.

services.name: Extended Ponytail
services.description: An extended long ponytail is a sleek, polished hairstyle that adds dramatic length and volume to a natural ponytail using hair extensions. The look is smooth at the top, with hair slicked back tightly—either in a high, mid, or low ponytail—secured with gel or edge control for a clean, flawless finish. The extension hair is then wrapped or sewn around the base of the ponytail to blend seamlessly with your natural hair. A small piece of hair is usually wrapped around the ponytail base to conceal the band and give a professional, finished look. This style is chic and versatile—perfect for both casual and formal occasions—and can be worn bone-straight, curled, wavy, or even braided. It's ideal for adding instant glam and length while keeping your natural hair protected and tucked away.

services.name: Corn Row
services.description: The stylist begins braiding the hair flat against the scalp, weaving three strands together and gradually adding small sections of hair as they move along the row. This process is repeated for each part until the desired look is achieved.

services.name: Kids Braids
services.description: Decorative, custom braids for children under 11 yr old

services.name: Crochet Braids
services.description: The hair is braided into cornrows, usually straight back or in a customized pattern depending on the desired final look. Once the cornrows are complete, a latch hook (crochet needle) is used to insert the looped extensions underneath the cornrows. The hair is then pulled through the loop and tightened to secure it.

professionals.name: SoHo Salon Team
professionals.title: Professional Stylists
professionals.bio: Our experienced team specializes in both traditional and natural hair care, offering everything from precision cuts to protective braiding styles.

Deposits required for most services over $50
Buy Now, Pay Later options available
Specializes in natural hair care and protective styles

faq_items.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faq_items.answer: Yes! We offer free color consultations and hair extension consultations to help plan your perfect look.

faq_items.question: Do you require deposits?
faq_items.answer: Yes, deposits are required for most services over $50, especially color and chemical services.

faq_items.question: Do you offer financing options?
faq_items.answer: Yes! We offer Buy Now, Pay Later options for bookings between $50-$4,000. You can get approved before your appointment.

faq_items.question: Do you specialize in natural hair?
faq_items.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in natural hair care, protective styling, braiding services, silk press, and chemical-free treatments.

faq_items.question: Do you offer kids services?
faq_items.answer: Yes, we offer kids cuts for children 10 & under, as well as decorative custom braids for children under 11.

faq_items.question: What are your signature services?
faq_items.answer: Our signature services include Signature Cuts ($70+), Full Balayage ($215+), Silk Press ($100+), and comprehensive braiding services.

faq_items.question: What's the price range for your services?
faq_items.answer: We offer services from free consultations to premium treatments up to $310+. Most cuts range from $25-$70, color services $85-$215+, and treatments $20-$310+.

faq_items.question: How long do appointments take?
faq_items.answer: Appointment times vary: Quick services like bang trims take 15 minutes, cuts 30-75 minutes, color services 90-180 minutes, and braiding services 2-6+ hours.
